TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpCookieMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how cookies are used for a Web application.

span.span: Specifies how cookies are used for a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Перечисление используется для указания значения `cookieless` атрибута в `sessionState` раздел конфигурации.The enumeration is used to specify the value of the `cookieless` attribute in the `sessionState` configuration section. Он используется, все компоненты, которые поддерживают проверку подлинности без поддержки файлов cookie.It is used by all features that support cookieless authentication. Значения перечисления определяют использование файла cookie для сохранения сведений о пользователе.The enumeration values specify how a cookie should be used to maintain information about the user. При использовании автообнаружения, ASP.NET отправляет запрос в браузер или устройство, чтобы определить, поддерживает ли файлы cookie.When AutoDetect is used, ASP.NET queries the browser or device to determine whether it supports cookies. Если браузер или устройство поддерживает файлы cookie, то файлы cookie используются для хранения пользовательских данных; в противном случае — идентификатор используется в строке запроса.If the browser or device supports cookies, then cookies are used to persist user data; otherwise, an identifier is used in the query string.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.HttpCookieMode AutoDetect = int32(2)

summary.span: ASP.NET determines whether the requesting browser or device supports cookies.

span.span: ASP.NET determines whether the requesting browser or device supports cookies.

summary.span: If the requesting browser or device supports cookies then uses cookies to persist user data; otherwise, an identifier is used in the query string.

span.span: If the requesting browser or device supports cookies then uses cookies to persist user data; otherwise, an identifier is used in the query string.

summary.span: If the browser or device supports the use of cookies but cookies are currently disabled, cookies are still used by the requesting feature.

span.span: If the browser or device supports the use of cookies but cookies are currently disabled, cookies are still used by the requesting feature.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.HttpCookieMode UseCookies = int32(1)

summary.span: Cookies are used to persist user data regardless of whether the browser or device supports cookies.

span.span: Cookies are used to persist user data regardless of whether the browser or device supports cookies.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.HttpCookieMode UseDeviceProfile = int32(3)

summary.span: ASP.NET determines whether to use cookies based on setting.

span.span: ASP.NET determines whether to use cookies based on setting.

summary.span: If the setting indicates that the browser or device supports cookies, cookies are used; otherwise, an identifier is used in the query string.

span.span: If the setting indicates that the browser or device supports cookies, cookies are used; otherwise, an identifier is used in the query string.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.HttpCookieMode UseUri = int32(0)

summary.span: The calling feature uses the query string to store an identifier regardless of whether the browser or device supports cookies.

span.span: The calling feature uses the query string to store an identifier regardless of whether the browser or device supports cookies.
